meanings: [명사] danger, risk, hazard, (formal) peril, [형용사] dangerous, risky, critical, (formal) perilous, (특히 사람의 건강·안전 등에) hazardous (to)

vlive.korean: 아니야 아니야 그거 진짜 위험해 뱉아 뱉아! No, no. That's really dangerous. Spit it out. Spit it out. 듣기 View video Stray Kids : 산을 넘어 산호세로 ~~❤
vlive.english: No, no. That's really dangerous. Spit it out. Spit it out.

vlive.korean: 위험한 거 아닙니까, 하지만 - 어떤 식으로, 어떤 식으로 했어요? it's dangerous if you fall. - How did you do it? 듣기 View video BTS : [Full] BTS Comeback Special: '보'이는 '라'이브 '해'요
vlive.english: it's dangerous if you fall. - How did you do it?

vlive.korean: 저는 봤거든요 - 되게 위험해 보였는데 괜찮으셨나요? So I saw it. - It looked dangerous. Was it okay? 듣기 View video iKON : [Replay] iKON ‘i DECIDE’ COUNTDOWN LIVE
vlive.english: So I saw it. - It looked dangerous. Was it okay?

vlive.korean: 되게 위험한 발언이야 - 뜬금없이... - 무슨 개똥 같은... Why did you say that? - Out of the blue... - It's nonsense. 듣기 View video SECHSKIES : [Replay] SECHSKIES - COMEBACK LIVE '젝다방 포 유 (SECHDABANG FOR YOU)'
vlive.english: Why did you say that? - Out of the blue... - It's nonsense.

vlive.korean: '소정 언니 벨트 매요 위험해요' 저 벨트 매고 있는 걸요 왜 그러세요? "Sowon, wear a seatbelt! It's dangerous!" I am wearing one! 듣기 View video GFRIEND : 🦊🐥🐰
vlive.english: "Sowon, wear a seatbelt! It's dangerous!" I am wearing one!
